data.quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
data.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

data.quote: You always gain by giving love
data.author: Reese Witherspoon

data.quote: Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
data.author: Anne Frank

data.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.
data.author: Bob Marley

data.quote: Only the gentle are really strong
data.author: James Dean

data.quote: Nothing will work unless you do
data.author: Maya Angelou
